Best Solution Found: (197)
01 06 18 16 19 05 03 09 04 17 13 20 08 10 12 11 07 14 02 15 01

01 06 = 3
06 18 = 18
18 16 = 3
16 19 = 18
19 05 = 6
05 03 = 3
03 09 = 2
09 04 = 9
04 17 = 13
17 13 = 10
13 20 = 8
20 08 = 18
08 10 = 16
10 12 = 15
12 11 = 22
11 07 = 19
07 14 = 2
14 02 = 6
02 15 = 3
15 01 = 3
